practice_phrases: I need to know in the first place.
我需要最初知道。
I had to share in the first place.
我最初不得不分享。
You told me in the first place.
你最初告诉我。
I was happy in the first place.
我最初很高兴。
We were talking about it in the first place.
我们最初在谈论它。
I suspect you heard in the first place.
我怀疑你最初听过。
My sister told me in the first place.
我妹妹最初告诉我。
I had to share my toys in the first place.
我最初不得不分享我的玩具。
I need to lie down in the garden in the first place.
我最初需要在花园里躺下。
He heard stories about it in the first place.
他最初听过关于它的故事。
I heard how it started.
我听过它是如何开始的。
You told me how it started.
你告诉我它是如何开始的。
I suspect how it started.
我怀疑它是如何开始的。
My sister knows how it started.
我妹妹知道它是如何开始的。
I need to know how it started.
我需要知道它是如何开始的。
He heard stories about how it started.
他听过关于它是如何开始的故事。
We were talking about how it started.
我们在谈论它是如何开始的。
I was happy to hear how it started.
我很高兴听到它是如何开始的。
I had to share how it started with my sister.
我不得不和我妹妹分享它是如何开始的。
How it started in the first place.
它最初是如何开始的。
